page.title: 07EMILY'S DAY IN WILLOUGHBY
page.content: After school I went to Widmerpool, the next village, with Sally.Some of the children in our school live in Widmerpool and have to be brought by car every day to Willoughby School. When we got to Sally's house we went to play with Kirsty for about an hour.Then we had tea and after tea we went to play witches with Kirsty, Sally and Kelly. After that, Sally's mum brought me home in the car. Then I watched T.V. until bedtime which was 9.30.p.m. Then I read until 10.00.p.m. when I got to sleep.
